name: CMGT_EVAL_returnTaskAssignmentHistoryForRoles
description: Returns task assignment history updated to the role
sail_code:
if(
  or(
    a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!assignedGroup),
    a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!assignedUser)
  ),
  #"urn:appian:function:v1:a:update"(
    recordType!CMGT_Role(
      recordType!CMGT_Role.groupId: ri!assignedGroup,
      recordType!CMGT_Role.roleTypeId: ri!assigneeTypeId,
      recordType!CMGT_Role.username: ri!assignedUser,
      recordType!CMGT_Role.taskId: ri!taskId
    ),
    recordType!CMGT_Role.taskAssignmentHistory,
    recordType!CMGT_TaskAssignmentHistory(
      recordType!CMGT_TaskAssignmentHistory.assignmentRuleId: ri!applicableAssignmentRule[recordType!CMGT_AssignmentRule.assignmentRuleId],
      recordType!CMGT_TaskAssignmentHistory.assignmentVersion: ri!applicableAssignmentRule[recordType!CMGT_AssignmentRule.assignmentVersion],
      recordType!CMGT_TaskAssignmentHistory.routingType: ri!applicableAssignmentRule[recordType!CMGT_AssignmentRule.routingType],
      recordType!CMGT_TaskAssignmentHistory.taskBehaviorTypeId: ri!taskBehaviorTypeId,
      recordType!CMGT_TaskAssignmentHistory.createdBy: ri!initiator,
      recordType!CMGT_TaskAssignmentHistory.createdOn: now()
    )
  ),
  {}
)
